resources.string: There aren\'t normal permissions for this app.
There aren\'t dangerous permissions for this app.
There aren\'t privileged or signature permissions for this app.
Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

EzPermissions is an application permission manager that will help you to know the permissions used by all the applications installed on your smartphone and will allow you to easily revoke permissions considered dangerous.

• View all the applications installed on your device.
• Click on any app in the list to see the details of its permissions, grouped by category.
• Control access to dangerous permissions for each installed application.
• Set time intervals to grant temporary access to dangerous permissions per application.
To obtain the maximum functionality of the application it is necessary to be a ROOT user.
